messages.title: Pat's message to the Maidenhead Constituency
messages.content: This election is a choice between a Labour Party who will build a Britain for the many, and a Conservative Party for the few...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Will build over a million new homes in five years, half of them council homes.
A Labour government will improve the proposed closure of A&Es in England and other essential departments.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Put the Public Back in Our Economy
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Railways back into public ownership, regulate fares, service levels and the expansion of the provision of public wifi.
Investing in schools to ensure children get the right start in life.
Will give people stronger employment rights and expand zero hours contracts.

issues.economy: After seven years of Tory economic failure...
issues.education: The highest quality education for every child...
issues.governance: The Tories only look after a privileged few...

housing.content: Will build over a million new homes in five years, half of them council homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am very much a local, having grown up in Maidenhead. I attended local schools and am the headteacher of one of our local senior schools. I have a proven track record of public service, including a youth club ownership...

politicalExperience.achievements: Headteacher at a local senior school.
Serving as a parish councillor since being elected in 1994.
